Questions

Some questions I don't know the answers to.

Would appreciate pointers to references which can help answer or some philosophizing on the right answer.

  • What is the expected lifespan of human organs? I read somewhere on the Internet that lungs are expected to last 60 - 70 years but our brains could go to 120 years?
  • What is the embodied energy cost of popular motorized vehicle transport mechanisms?

Since my questions page is not very intersting (yet), here are some other people's questions pages.

  • Patrick Collison, co-founder of Stripe. I really like his first question.
